doc:
Clive Rowe https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clive_Rowe 0 Clive Mark Rowe, (27 March 1964, Oldham, Lancashire) is a British actor, best known for his role as Norman "Duke" Ellington in BBC Children's drama The Story of Tracy Beaker. He also starred as Mayor Doyle in the hit Disney show The Evermoor Chronicles. Rowe grew up in Shaw, Lancashire, in the parish of East Crompton and attended St. James Primary School and Crompton House School. As a teenager he was a member of Crompton Stage Society. He is a graduate of the Guildhall School of Music and Drama. Clive Rowe has appeared in many pantomimes. Clive_Mark_Rowe , ( 27_March_1964_,_Oldham_,_Lancashire ) is a_British_actor , best_known for his_role as Norman_"_Duke_"_Ellington in BBC_Children 's_drama The_Story of Tracy_Beaker . He is a_graduate of the_Guildhall_School of Music_and_Drama . Clive_Rowe has_appeared in many_pantomimes .
